channel.title: [VB6] Looking for a way to do this
channel.description:
Bascially i want to find a way to replace lets say every letter A in the textbox with a C.
[code] If InStrB(Text1.Text, "A") <> 0 Then Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "A", "C") End If [/code]
This seems to work, but when trying to make a whole alphabet of these, my own kind of encryption for text - it messes up and ends up replacing the letters with letters i didn't choose.
For example i just tried the ceaser cipher i saw posted here
[code]Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "a", "d") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "b", "e") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "c", "f") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "d", "g") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "e", "h") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "f", "i") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "g", "j") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "h", "k") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "i", "l") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "j", "m") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "k", "n") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "l", "o") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "m", "p") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "n", "q") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "o", "r") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "p", "s") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "q", "t") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "r", "u") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "s", "v") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "t", "w") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "u", "x") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "v", "y") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "w", "z") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "x", "a") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "y", "b") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "z", "c") [/code]
And when running this code on the text Moparisthebest i get Mabbaabcccccbc.
Please help you guys :D
Thank you.

item.title: [VB6] Looking for a way to do this
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

What I did in C# for my ROT13, is I converted each of the char’s in the string to an int, shifted them x places (13 in my case, you can do it by x however many letters you want), made sure it doesn’t overflow (if it’s over a specific number, subtract 26) and repeat for lowercase letters.

Read full topic
item.source: [VB6] Looking for a way to do this

item.title: [VB6] Looking for a way to do this
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“ownagesbot, post:5, topic:248853”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=328111.msg2567830#msg2567830 date=1228488402]
Make 2 arrays, one containing the normal alphabet and one with the ones you want to replace it with. Say you want to replace the ‘a’ with a ‘r’ then you make the first (index 0) character of the replacement array a ‘r’. Then you make all uppercase letters into lowercase letters.

You can come up with the rest. Make some sort of loop or whatever and loop through the string replacing the characters with another one.
[/quote][/quote]
Nothing wrong with a few day bump, IF YOU ACTUALLY FUCKING CONTRIBUTE SOMETHING.
[center] Agreed, you should try it ;)[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: [VB6] Looking for a way to do this

item.title: [VB6] Looking for a way to do this
item.dc:creator: @jGod jGod
item.description:
@jGod wrote:

Chr(Asc(Mid(strSentence, POSITION, 1)) + 3)

Iterate through and replace each position.

Read full topic

You can come up with the rest. Make some sort of loop or whatever and loop through the string replacing the characters with another one.

item.title: [VB6] Looking for a way to do this
item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

Bascially i want to find a way to replace lets say every letter A in the textbox with a C.

If InStrB(Text1.Text, "A") <> 0 Then
Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "A", "C")
End If

This seems to work, but when trying to make a whole alphabet of these, my own kind of encryption for text - it messes up and ends up replacing the letters with letters i didn’t choose.

For example i just tried the ceaser cipher i saw posted here

Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "a", "d") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "b", "e") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "c", "f") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "d", "g") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "e", "h") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "f", "i") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "g", "j") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "h", "k") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "i", "l") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "j", "m") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "k", "n") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "l", "o") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "m", "p") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "n", "q") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "o", "r") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "p", "s") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "q", "t") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "r", "u") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "s", "v") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "t", "w") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "u", "x") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "v", "y") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "w", "z") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "x", "a") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "y", "b") Text1.Text = Replace(Text1.Text, "z", "c")

And when running this code on the text Moparisthebest i get Mabbaabcccccbc.

Please help you guys
